definition: senior official/senior officer/commanding officer/CL:位[wei4]/sir (term of address for senior officer)
secretary of state (esp. historical, or Japanese or Korean usage)

sentences.english: The Governor of Prome did indeed lead a in 1743 raid.
sentences.chinese: 卑廖地方长官在1743年确实发动了一次进攻。

sentences.english: The Chief Executive may, as he or she deems necessary, invite other persons concerned to sit in on meetings of the Council.
sentences.chinese: 行政长官认为必要时可邀请有关人士列席会议。

sentences.english: Second, I expect the McCain campaign to double down on the executive experience issue.
sentences.chinese: 第二，我期待麦凯恩竞选兼任行政经验问题长官。

sentences.english: This would take another large slice of business off the shoulders of the military chiefs.
sentences.chinese: 这将从军事长官们的肩上又卸除一大部分负担。

sentences.english: That includes Shell, its chief executive said last month.
sentences.chinese: 这其中包括壳牌，其行政长官上个月说。

sentences.english: Gunfire shocked the chief commander Liu Xunde guard.
sentences.chinese: 枪声惊动了司令长官刘勋德的卫队。

sentences.english: He answered, "Yes Sir, but the Goddamned wire has to be fixed".
sentences.chinese: 他回答，“对，长官，但这该死的电线不修不行”。

sentences.english: Tang also met with ROK Foreign Minister Yu Myung-hwan.
sentences.chinese: 唐家璇还会见了韩国外交通商部长官柳明桓。

sentences.english: Bosworth also held a separate meeting with South Korean Foreign Minister Kim Sung-hwan.
sentences.chinese: 博斯沃思还和韩国外交通商部长官金星焕举行了会谈。

sentences.english: I rolled my eyes at them because they just gossiped about me.
sentences.chinese: 长官，她刚才朝我们翻了个白眼。

sentences.english: One of their targets was a monthly breakfast meeting of Western executives.
sentences.chinese: 他们的目标之一是每月一次的西方长官早餐会。

sentences.english: Hong Kong's chief executive, Donald Tsang, condemned the acts as 'cold-blooded and malicious.
sentences.chinese: 香港行政长官曾荫权谴责镪水袭击行为“冷血恶毒”。

sentences.english: "Nothing, sir, " Yang answered as he pored over the data flashing on his screens.
sentences.chinese: “没有异常，长官，”杨凝视着闪烁的显示屏说道。

sentences.english: More on that news conference by Chief Cabinet Secretary Yukio Edano.
sentences.chinese: 内阁官房长官枝野幸男在新闻发布会上还说了更多。

definition: middle ranking officer in Chinese army/lieutenant colonel/commander
high ranking officer in Chinese army/colonel
junior ranking officer in Chinese army/major/lieutenant commander
commander-in-chief/top military commander for a country or theater of operations
